channel.title: South Carolina chapter?
channel.description: Hi! I was contacted by a lady in Myrtle Beach, SC. She wanted to get a car for her 2 year old with MoWat Wilson syndrome. I would like to get her help, but I'm in Texas is there any chapters or local places that can help her near South Carolina? Thanks in advance!

item.title: South Carolina chapter?
item.dc:creator: Mel
item.description:
Hi All
Laing Middle School in Mt Pleasant SC will be happy to help! We work with the Medical University of South Carolina, and have re-purposed a variety of vehicles. Please feel free to contact me at mgoodwi8@bellsouth.net or my cell, 830-843-6480.
– Mel Goodwin

Read full topic

item.title: South Carolina chapter?
item.dc:creator: gavin.wood
item.description:
I found this post on the UD GBG Facebook page, but that’s about all I found.

facebook.com

UD GoBabyGo

Anybody in the Columbia, South Carolina area who can help Leesha with her car-modification process? From Leesha: "I have a strong interest in making a car for my son. I'm overwhelmed as to where to...

I’ll keep you posted if I come across anything else.

item.title: South Carolina chapter?
item.dc:creator: Cullen
item.description:
Hi!
I was contacted by a lady in Myrtle Beach, SC. She wanted to get a car for her 2 year old with MoWat Wilson syndrome. I would like to get her help, but I’m in Texas is there any chapters or local places that can help her near South Carolina?
Thanks in advance!
